resources.string: Are you sure you want to abandon your current mission?
Search chests for <font color="#eaeaea">{itemAmount} {itemName}</font> at <font color="#eaeaea">{POITags}</font>.
Search chests at <font color="#eaeaea">{POITags}</font> for <font color="#eaeaea">{itemAmount} {itemName}</font>.
Obtain <font color="#eaeaea">{itemAmount} {itemName}</font> from Enemies at <font color="#eaeaea">{POITags}</font>.
Travel to <font color="#eaeaea">{destinationName}</font> and deliver <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font>.
Dropping or Storing this item will destroy it.
No, let me think about it.

You will only be able to join a Company with players of the same Faction. If flagged for PVP, you will only be able to group up with players from the same Faction. Before joining, you might want to double-check the Faction choices of your friends in New World.\n\nYour choice isn't permanent--you can change your faction from the Bio screen once. After that, you can change it again every <font color="#FFD45F">60 days</font>.
Align with 1 of the 3 warring Factions to maximize your experience in Aeternum. Reap the powerful rewards by competing against other Factions and tipping the scales of influence for each Territory.

To combat other players, you must be aligned with a Faction, then flag for PvP while inside a Settlement. Once Flagged, you can damage players of opposing Factions who are also flagged for PvP. (You will see their Faction crest on their nameplates.)

Coming Soon: Completing Faction Missions provided by your Faction representative within a Settlement earns Faction Influence points within that Territory. Faction Influence is the means of protecting your Territories, or declaring war on the enemy.

Complete Missions for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">XP</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Coin</font>, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Faction Tokens</font>.
Earn Influence to determine Territory Control
Compete strategically against enemy Factions in PvP Missions
Gain Access to Elite Faction Gear
Spend Faction Tokens on Special Weapons, Armor, and Consumables
Earn Ranks to Unlock Advanced Tiers and Crafting Components
Enjoy the Benefits of Territory Control
Reduced cost for Workshops and Fast Travel
Complete Town Missions to Upgrade the Settlement
Flag for PvP from any Settlement or Outpost (default key U)
Contribute to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Faction Influence</font> within the Territory
Faction Members of Controlling Faction Enjoy Benefits in Territory and Settlement
Controlling Factions <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Reinforce</font> control by completing PvP Faction Missions
Opposing Factions <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Undermine</font> enemy Faction’s Control by completing PvP Faction Missions
Earn enough Influence to challenge for Territory Control through a Declaration of War
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">50 v 50 player</font> siege combat at a Territory’s Fortress
Utilize a variety of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Siege Weapons</font> to get the upper hand on your opponents.
The Attacker’s objective is to claim the capture point at the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">heart of the fortress</font>.
The Defender’s objective is to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">fend off the attackers for 30 minutes</font>.
Territory Influence is a measure of a Faction's control of a Territory
Complete <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Faction PvP Missions</font> to retain control of a Territory
The Factions that do not control that Territory must complete PvP Faction Missions to enable a Declaration of War
Reinforce or undermine a faction’s territory
Controlling Factions <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Reinforce</font> control by completing PvP Faction Missions
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Undermine</font> the opposing Faction’s Territories by completing PvP Faction Missions within their Territories
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Prevent other Factions</font> from completing PvP Faction Missions by flagging for PvP and patrolling the Territory
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Prevent the controlling</font> Faction from completing PvP Faction Missions by flagging for PvP and patrolling those Territories
Flag for PvP from any Settlement or Outpost (default key U). Enabling your PvP flag grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">additional XP</font>

Upon leaving a Settlement, you receive a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">30 second timer</font> before becoming flagged. Once the timer expires, you are free to engage flagged members of the opposing Factions

Contribute to the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#DDDDDD">Influence War</font> to help your faction take control of each Territory by completing PVP Faction Missions. Keep an eye out for enemy players who are flagged, and stop them from earning Influence for their Faction by cutting them down
Failing or abandoning this mission will result in a loss of {amount} {guildName} Tokens.
Divine Champions who fight with Conviction for Righteousness and Justice
“Defending the spark of hope is our sacred duty…”
Clever Disciples who fight with Cunning for the sake of Truth and Progress
“The pursuit of knowledge and insight at any costs…”
Proud Warriors who fight with Honor for Glory and Self-Improvement
“Through conflict, one grows in strength and skill…”
You need to meet all requirements in order to unlock the next rank.
A new mission will be available soon

Are you sure you want to abandon your current mission to start this one?\n\nAbandoning your current mission will result in <font color="#f2e8ae">{amount} Faction Tokens</font> with the <font color="#ffffff">{guildName}</font>.
{amount} Azoth
Your faction has {count} territories in conflict! Press M to view the map.
The {faction} faction has thrown {territoryName} into a conflict state! They can now declare war.
A company in {faction} has declared war on {territoryName}, the final warring company will be determined in {time}
Companies have declared war, the warring company will be determined soon.

Taking a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> will <font color="#eaeaea">flag you for PvP</font>.
You cannot toggle off your PvP Flag during this mission. To toggle it off, you must abandon the mission first.

Are you sure you want to take this mission?
You cannot accept a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> while you are in a PvE group which will not allow you to turn on your PvP Flag.
You cannot accept a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> while you have pending group invites which will not allow you to turn on your PvP Flag.
You cannot accept a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> until you join a faction.
You cannot accept a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> until you are in a sanctuary.
You cannot accept a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> of this type at this time.
You cannot accept a <font color="#eaeaea">PvP mission</font> at this time.
Only 1 Mission can be active at a time.
U N L O C K {azoth} {coin} {token}
Go to <font color="#eaeaea">{POITags}</font> and Search for <font color="#eaeaea">{itemAmount} {itemName}</font>.
Clever Disciples who fight with Cunning for the sake of Truth and Progress
Proud Warriors who fight with Honor for Glory and Self-Improvement
Divine Champions who fight with Conviction for Righteousness and Justice
Search for <font color="#eaeaea">{itemAmount} {itemName}</font> at <font color="#eaeaea">{POITags}.</font>Return here for delivery.
We've identified a threat to Marauder interests in this region.\n\nGo to {POITags} and defeat every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary - with extreme prejudice.
Perform reconnaissance here to give the Marauders an edge. \n\nYour report is critical to formulate our strategy.
There are items at {POITags} that could be valuable to the Marauder campaign. \n\nAcquire each <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> using whatever means necessary.
We need supplies for Marauder troops. \n\nHunt down <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> in the {POITags} area and bring back your bounty.
Unspeakable horrors that could compromise the Syndicate are unfolding at {POITags}. \n\nDestroy every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary - without exception.
We cannot proceed with our plans until we get more information. \n\nGo to {POITags} and bring back your report.
The Syndicate has learned that there's a cache of valuable items at {POITags}. \n\nGo quickly and retrieve each <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> before anyone else is aware.
Syndicate Operatives need sustenance to continue their work. \n\nHunt the {POITags} area for the <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> that roam there and bring back what you find.
The Covenant must fight against the tide of darkness emanating from {POITags}. \n\nDestroy every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary, for the good of us all.
We don't have a solid grasp on the situation at {POITags}. \n\nIt may be too late. Assess the scene and report back.
We've discovered that there are precious items at {POITags}. \n\nEach <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> belongs with the Covenant - go quickly and retrieve them.
We need supplies to support the Covenant cause.\n\nHunt the {POITags} area for the <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> that roam there and bring us back your yield.
Weaken our enemy by destructing their resources.
All of Aeturnum belongs to us. Prove it.
Retrieve Marauder asset and await further instructions.
Capture or destroy resources before they can be used against us.
This spot is of strategic import. Don't let it fall into enemy hands.
Retrieve important experiment data and wait for instructions.
Starve the enemy, feed the Spark.
Liberate this area. Stand strong, walk in the light.
Help deliver the good news of the Spark.
Delve into {POITags} for the Marauders and defeat every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary. \n\n <font color="#eaeaea">(Expedition)</font>
Delve into {POITags} for the Marauders and collect each <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> within. \n\n<font color="#eaeaea">(Expedition)</font>
Defeat <font color="#eaeaea">Syndicate</font> or <font color="#eaeaea">Covenant</font> members for the glory of the Marauders.
Defeat <font color="#eaeaea">Marauder</font> or <font color="#eaeaea">Covenant</font> members to demonstrate our superiority.
Defeat <font color="#eaeaea">Syndicate</font> or <font color="#eaeaea">Marauder</font> members to purify their souls.
Delve into {POITags} for the Syndicate and defeat every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary. \n\n <font color="#eaeaea">(Expedition)</font>
Delve into {POITags} for the Syndicate and collect each <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> within.\n\n <font color="#eaeaea">(Expedition)</font>
Delve into {POITags} for the Covenant and defeat every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary.\n\n <font color="#eaeaea">(Expedition)</font>
Delve into {POITags} for the Covenant and collect each <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> within.\n\n <font color="#eaeaea">(Expedition)</font>
The Marauders need <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> removed from the theater.\n\nProve your valor by tracking them down in {POITags} and destroying them.
The Syndicate has identified <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> to be a target for elimination.\n\nProve your cunning by tracking them down in {POITags} and destroying them.
The Covenant has identified <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> to be eliminated.\n\nProve your devotion by tracking them down in {POITags} and destroying them.

The Marauders need <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> removed from the theater.

Prove your valor by tracking them down in {POITags} and destroying them.

Prove your cunning by tracking them down in {POITags} and destroying them.

Destroy every <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> necessary, for the good of us all.
 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>

We've discovered that there are precious items at {POITags}. 

Each <font color="#eaeaea">{itemName}</font> belongs with the Covenant - go quickly and retrieve them.
 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>

New recruits are whining about sore hands from training!

Get some Blister Balm from Boatswain Ambrose at Nyhart's Anchorage.

 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>

We have a small book club in town, and we need new material.

Perhaps you could get an Ancient Scroll from Laocon the Tutor in Saircor?

 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>

I have a theory for redeeming the Souls of the Lost.

Get the Soulful Muffins Recipe from Chef Paul Giroux at Hilltop Encampment?

 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>

A damned Lost Turncoat is impeding our troop movements between here and First Light!

Destroy Emilio Rose at Buccaneer Falls.

 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>

We need to get the attention of Constable Dauti.

Get Perhaps you could get an Ancient Scroll from Laocon the Tutor in Saircor?

 <font color="#eaeaea">(Elite)</font>
Prove your hunting skill.\n\nTake down <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> at {POITags} and bring back proof of your dominance.
We've identified a subject that merits closer study.\n\nHunt {POITags} for <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> and return with a tissue sample.
The Spark provides a great opportunity.\n\nSeize it by defeating <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> at {POITags} and return with its bountiful yield

Take down <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> at {POITags} and bring back proof of your dominance.

Infiltrate the <font color="#eaeaea">War Camp</font> next to <font color="#eaeaea">Fort {territoryID}</font> and search for valuable intelligence.
Take up arms to help the Marauders take control of the <font color="#eaeaea">Fort</font> at <font color="#eaeaea">{territoryID}</font>.\n\n(This mission may not be completable at all times)
Infiltrate the <font color="#eaeaea">War Camp</font> next to <font color="#eaeaea">Fort {territoryID}</font> and search for valuable intelligence.
Take up arms to help the Syndicate take control of the <font color="#eaeaea">Fort</font> at <font color="#eaeaea">{territoryID}</font>.\n\n(This mission may not be completable at all times)

Infiltrate the stronghold at <font color="#eaeaea">{POITags}</font> and search for valuable intelligence.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Sword</font> by striking down <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its keen blade.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Rapier</font> by perferating <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its dazzling speed.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Hatchet</font> by hacking down <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its ferocious rage.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Great Axe</font> by cleaving <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its fearsome blade.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">War Hammer</font> by mauling <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its crushing power.

Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Bow</font> by piearcing <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its deadly arrows.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Musket</font> by gunning down <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its explosive blasts.

Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Life Staff</font> by smiting <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its mortal power.
Marauders must master all tools of war.\n\nProve your skill with the <font color="#eaeaea">Ice Gauntlet</font> by freezing <font color="#eaeaea">{enemyName}</font> with its frigid touch.
